attributes.action: Make first aid and sign language a compulsory lesson in the English curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: Surely learning “hello” and “thank you” in French or German isn’t anywhere near as important as being able to communicate if/when you lose you hearing. Surly that would save the NHS money somewhere down the line too.
attributes.background: I’ve thought for years and talk about it regularly that there isn’t anything more worth while someone could be taught than to save a life, or to be able to communicate with someone who has lost their hearing or when they them selves do.
